website_summaries.verdict: This scrub doesn't come in a pretty package, but it gets the job done.
pros: Includes coconut oil, Vitamin E and sea salt

customer_reviews.title: A decent way to percolate some glowing skin
customer_reviews.text: I use this scrub about once a week in the shower. Although I like it, there are a few things to know: - The "grind" is a lot coarser than I expected. I have to rub very gently with it or else I get scratches from it - My skin feels moisturized and really smooth afterward! :-) - Be prepared for a mess! This stuff gets everywhere, and when I wash this off my bathroom smells like a cafe on a Saturday morning (not a bad thing) You can basically make this at home if you want to, and I might try it using coffee with a finer grind
customer_reviews.author: Khun Nali

customer_reviews.title: Great Scrub - Works well for stretch marks
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is GREAT. It smells lovely, the coffee grounds are not too harsh of an exfoliant and the coconut oil leaves your skin feeling soft and hydrated. I have noticed a reduction in how visible my stretch marks on my stomach (from pregnancy) are since using it. I use other products as well but I do believe that this one is helping out quite a bit. The only nuisance is trying to get all the coffee grains to rinse down out of the shower. If you miss any it does look like you have some sort of critter leaving droppings in your shower.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Sea

customer_reviews.title: Usually this coffee scrub has been pretty good until my last order
customer_reviews.text: Usually this coffee scrub has been pretty good until my last order. The scrub leaves so much residue and even stains my skin. None of the past scrubs I’ve bought did this. I was so sad! I’m not sure if they changed their formula or ingredients or recipe or whatever it is ,but the ones I’ve previosuly bought never did this. Will try a different brand and make sure it doesn’t leave dark residue.
customer_reviews.author: Carolina White

customer_reviews.title: LOVE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this scrub! This is my second bag (my first one lasted me like 6 months). It smells amazing and is so moisturizing it leaves my skin so soft! Definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a body scrub!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I love this scrub. It has a great smell, not greasy and leaves a slight tint.(Don’t use a white towel). Leaves your body feeling moisturized and energized.
customer_reviews.author: Char

customer_reviews.title: Dark skin
customer_reviews.text: Leave dark spots in the skin and hard to wash it out
customer_reviews.author: Viktoryia

customer_reviews.title: I really like this scrub - it is exfoliating and moisturizing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this scrub - it is exfoliating and moisturizing. The only thing that I don't love is that it leaves dark residue on my skin, which I then have to wash off. I'm still moisturized after a wash, but would like it better if not so dark on my skin. It's overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: My favorite scrub ever
customer_reviews.text: In love with this scrub. Leaves my skin soft and moisturized. Awesome smell - it is messy, but I'm ok with that. A little goes a long way, so this bag lasts a long time. I use it about 3x a week and I think it lasted 2 months. I was never a scrub person before trying this product, now I'm a concert and this is the only scrub I use.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie Sauer

customer_reviews.title: Great thing !
customer_reviews.text: Great thing, as expected! Fast delivery and good packaging !!
customer_reviews.author: jalil m.

customer_reviews.title: One of my favorites
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing! It definitely leaves your skin felling smooth, hydrated and glowy. The only downside is the mess; it’s actual coffee grounds so it’s extremely messy when applying it but honestly the smell and how it makes the skin feel it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Don't usually do reviews but this stuff is really nice. I like to exfoliate before applying sunless tan, and this worked great. My skin still feels moisturized and smooth 12 hours after use, and my tan went on smoothly. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No smell
customer_reviews.text: No any smell besides coffee , maybe I received a oldest product ?
customer_reviews.author: Galina

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stuff and it smells amazing
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff and it smells amazing, however I'm giving it 4 stars instead of 5 because it leaves brown stains on my skin after using it. it's no big deal and I just use soap to wash with afterwards and it comes right off but it's still a little bit annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: great scrub
customer_reviews.text: My skin feels so soft and moisturized after I use this scrub. No need to put on lotion after I use this.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Springer

customer_reviews.title: Favorite Scrub!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this! Usually I buy my coffee scrub (it comes as a body mask) from Lush, but this was so much better and smelled AMAZING. Plus, for the price you get so much more. I used it before shaving any my legs feel incredible and my skin feels super moisturized. Definitely worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great coffee body scrub
customer_reviews.text: Great coffee body scrub, just be careful on the shower curtain. it can stain a white cloth curtain. also seems to clog the drain a bit.
customer_reviews.author: Eric G

customer_reviews.title: I used this product in the past via their site ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this product in the past via their site but unfortunately I received this item in a different quality. I was hard and was not able to spread out the scrub.
customer_reviews.author: YAELI GARCIA

customer_reviews.title: Aweful Product
customer_reviews.text: Dry, loose, messy and doesn't do anything but fall off your skin and make a mess in your shower.
customer_reviews.author: Morgen Ayres

customer_reviews.title: Don't like the smell of it!
customer_reviews.text: Very strong coconut smell and not really convenient to use it from the packet like this.
customer_reviews.author: Abhi Garg

customer_reviews.title: Great scrub
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is awesome! Smells SO good, keeps skin well exfoliated and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Forrest

customer_reviews.title: I also love that the product works the way it says it ...
customer_reviews.text: The smell of this product alone is heaven! I also love that the product works the way it says it should without exception. AMAZING!
customer_reviews.author: Z

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS STUFF. Leaves my skin feeling smooth and refreshed. Need to restock actually
customer_reviews.author: Natasha

customer_reviews.title: Ohh yeah
customer_reviews.text: Amazing!! Smells delicious! aND smooth really gotta scrub hard! It does leave a coffee residue but you just gotta wash with your body wash afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well, but u need to wash thoroughly afterwards because of stain on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Darran Bowen

customer_reviews.title: I love the product but it's so messy 😨 It took ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the product but it's so messy 😨 It took a long time to scrub out of my shower
customer_reviews.author: tabitha1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect! Not too rough
customer_reviews.text: Perfect! Not too rough, not too gentle and my face feels like a baby's butt. All in all, this product is amazing. A little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The scrub smells like pure coffee which is great
customer_reviews.text: The scrub smells like pure coffee which is great. BUT it leaves a huge mess behind. Be ready to scrub your tub or shower immediately.
customer_reviews.author: LaDonna P. Portier

customer_reviews.title: You have to buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: I have been making and buying scrubs for years...this is by far amazing. I'm 35 yrs old and I'm on a weight loss plan. I've lost 26 pounds in the last 6 wks. I needed something to help with stretch marks and skin hydration, so that my skin elasticity will improve. This is working. I can't believe it. My skin is so soft, if your looking for a great scrub then you have to buy this.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer chapman

customer_reviews.title: Love the coffee scent
customer_reviews.text: I love the smell of coffee even though I don’t drink coffee, mainly water. It does get a little messy in the shower but easily wash off with water. I use the coffee scrub to exfoliate before shaving legs. On the side, I do dry brush two to three times a week. Apart from this scrub, it exfoliate extremely well and no issue so far.
customer_reviews.author: Vu

customer_reviews.title: For AMAZING feeling skin, buy this
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Truly amazing, this is the 5th time ordering this product, and I have never been disappointed. An Ode to Mr. Bean Organic, fair trade cruelty free, vitamin E soft skin, coconut If you have skin issues like eczema or stretch marks, they can help you!
customer_reviews.author: Raul

customer_reviews.title: This scrub is amazing! Leaves your skin moisterized
customer_reviews.text: This scrub is amazing! Leaves your skin moisterized, a little darker, and smooth. Makes your cellulite look smoothed out which is why I wanted to try it. Only reason I gave it a 4 star instead of 5 is because it leaves your shower a coffee bean mess.
customer_reviews.author: Gabriella Haas

customer_reviews.title: Not too good.
customer_reviews.text: It's too coarse and it's not as good as the studioready one.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Ayala

customer_reviews.title: Too messy
customer_reviews.text: As much as I want the benefits they claim I can’t take the mess! Not to mention the bag won’t close.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it makes your skin feel amazing and basically polishes it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My favorite organic coffee scrub
customer_reviews.text: My favorite organic coffee scrub. Does leave a slight dark coloring on skin, but washes right off with soap and worth it for the results it gives.
customer_reviews.author: Kellie Kano

customer_reviews.title: I really like this stuff
customer_reviews.text: I really like this stuff. It leaves my skin feeling amazing no need for lotion after I get out the shower. I cant really tell about the cellulite and stretch marks because I haven't been using it that long but the overall feel of my skin is AMAZING. And I love it for my face.
customer_reviews.author: Rogenia Hopkins

customer_reviews.title: ... i rinsed after the FIRST use i fell in love..
customer_reviews.text: I just received this product and right when i rinsed after the FIRST use i fell in love.... Your skin will feel as smooth as a baby's bottom. Just make sure to have a toner, such as Witch Hazel on hand because it did leave quite a bit of residue (not seen by eye, but you'll see on the cotton ball after toning) even after completely rinsing my face thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Chance Ryan

customer_reviews.title: She has bad excema and it seems to help with that an ...
customer_reviews.text: My friend LOVES this stuff, I buy it for her every holiday I can. She has bad excema and it seems to help with that an scarring. Smells nice, makes skin SO smooth and you feel a deep clean. HIGHLY RECOMMEND.
customer_reviews.author: Megan Wood

customer_reviews.title: It feels like a new face
customer_reviews.text: My skin has never felt as soft. It's literally incredible. It feels like a new face. The smell is amazing. However, it IS very messy and will leave your bathtub looking like s***. Also I find the price to be very steep for the amount of product you get. I think the pros outweigh the cons and I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy S

customer_reviews.title: What in the name of all that's holy?
customer_reviews.text: What is this stuff? Sure glad I smelled this before hopping in the shower to use it. First off, it smells NOTHING LIKE COFFEE of any type (high or low priced). And it doesn't smell like over-roasted beans, used coffee grounds, or synthetic coffee fragrance--actually those scents would likely smell better than this stuff. Gah. What it does smell like is dirt, and not healthy dirt either. It went right in the trash, there is not a chance in hell I'm ever putting this stuff on my body, and if you have any compassion for your coworkers, loved ones, or fellow commuters, you won't use it either. Gah, just...gah!
customer_reviews.author: J.

product_meta.title: Mr. Bean Organic All Natural Coffee Bean Exfoliating Body Skin Scrub with Coconut Oil, Vitamin E, and Sea Salt - Coconut
product_meta.description: Renew your skin with a stimulating exfoliant when you use the Coconut Coffee Scrub from Bean Body. Formulated with natural ingredients, this vegan-friendly scrub features demerara sugar and Himalayan salt for a satisfying exfoliant, while the coconut oil simultaneously hydrates your skin. Its key caffeine ingredient targets stretch marks, cellulite and other skin imperfections by stimulating blood flow and promoting cell rejuvenation. Scent: Coconut Suggested Age: All Ages Health Facts: Sulfate-free, formaldehyde-free, paraben-free, phthalate-free, aluminum-free, vegan, dye-free Product Form: Scrub Awards: 2017 Best Products of the Year, Cosmetic Executive Women Recommended Skin Type: Normal Beauty Purpose: Exfoliating Ingredients Organic Coffee Scrub with Robusta Coffee Beans, Organic Cold Pressed Coconut Oil, Himalayan pink rock salt, Demerara Sugar, Organic Cacao and Vitamin E oil.coconut essence. Inactive ingredients Coffea Arabica Seed Powder**, Hyaluronic Acid, Cocos Nucifera (Coconut) Oil, Sucrose, Sodium Chloride, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Powder, Glycerin, Tocopherol. Directions Gently massage scrub in a circular motion in the bath or shower, rinse well. Your skin will have a fine film of oil, do not worry, just gently pat your skin dry to leave it feeling super smooth and soft! Avoid broken or freshly shaven skin.
feature_bullets: A SCRUB FOR YOUR WHOLE BODY: Mr. Bean Body Care is here to help you get a smoother skin! Use the Coffee Scrub on your whole body and get rid of all the dead cells that make it look dry and dull. After every use, you’ll touch your skin and it will feel softer than ever. The Coffee Exfoliating Scrub is ideal for your legs, hands, back, feet and face. Try it and see the difference yourself!

GET RID OF ANY IMPERFECTIONS: Do you have acne scars, stretch marks, cellulite and other skin imperfections? It is time to say goodbye! Mr. Bean Body Care will help you get rid of any imperfection, using the power of caffeine. With regular exfoliation using the Coffee Scrub, your skin will become smoother, more even and free of blemishes. Trust Mr. Bean Body Care to do that for you.

HAVE HEALTHY AND GLOWY SKIN: The best favor you could do to skin is exfoliate it regularly. Exfoliation is what will keep your skin healthy, glowy, firm, rejuvenated and younger-looking. The Organic Coffee Scrub will make your skin smoother than ever! From the very first use you will have a more moisturized skin that will look as if you just came out of a spa therapy

AN ORGANIC NATURAL FORMULA: All the ingredients of the Mr. Bean Body Care Coffee Scrub are organic and natural. It is made with Robusta Coffee Beans, Organic cold pressed coconut oil, Himalayan pink rock salt, Demerara sugar, Organic cacao and vitamin E oil. It is a 100% safe caffeine based Exfoliating Scrub, free of hazardous chemicals and additives. Because you deserve the best!

ENOUGH SCRUB FOR MANY USES: Mr. Bean Body Care comes in a sealed bag of 220grams. The bag has a zipper-like closure so that your Coffee Scrub will stay fresh and it won’t create a mess if it falls. The 220grams are enough to use the Coffee Scrub up to 2030 times. So don’t hold back! Exfoliate regularly and let Mr. Bean Body Care works its magic on your skin.

specifications.Manufacturer: MR BEAN BODY CARE PTY LTD
